item.title: Health care executive Terry Clark appointed CEO at the PGA of America
item.description: Terry Clark has been appointed the next CEO at the PGA of America

item.title: Syria signs landmark offshore oil field deal with Chevron and a Qatari investor
item.description: Syria's state-owned petroleum company has signed a memorandum of understanding with Chevron and a Qatari energy investment company to develop the coun...

item.title: Russia and Ukraine envoys meet in Abu Dhabi for US-brokered talks
item.description: Envoys from Moscow and Kyiv meet in Abu Dhabi for U.S.-brokered talks to end the nearly four-year war

item.title: Washington Post says one-third of its staff across all departments is being laid off
item.description: The Washington Post says one-third of its staff across all departments, not just the newsroom, is being laid off

item.title: Edmunds puts sedans Nissan Sentra and Toyota Corolla to the test
item.description: With average new car prices nearing $50,000, the Toyota Corolla and Nissan Sentra remain vital, affordable entry-level options
